column1: Shell command built from environment values
column2: Building a shell command string with values from the enclosing environment may cause subtle bugs or vulnerabilities.
column4: This shell command depends on an uncontrolled [["absolute path"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-078/examples/shell-command-injection-from-environment.js:4:35:4:43"]].
